video.title: Hemlock Grove
video.synopsis: Secrets are just a part of daily life in the small Pennsylvania town of Hemlock Grove, where the darkest evils hide in plain sight.

episodes.synopsis: A teenager is murdered in the woods of Hemlock Grove. Evidence points to an animal attack, but suspicions soon fall on Peter, the newly arrived gypsy.
episodes.title: Jellyfish in the Sky

episodes.synopsis: Roman confronts Peter at the crime scene, finding common ground. Letha reveals a shocking secret, and Olivia and Norman fall into old habits.
episodes.title: The Angel

episodes.synopsis: Christina discovers a new victim, and Sheriff Sworn gets outside help from Dr. Chasseur. Now a suspect, Peter joins Roman to find the killer.
episodes.title: The Order of the Dragon

episodes.synopsis: Letha's interest in Peter takes a turn. Chasseur and Sworn's investigation hits a new low, while Roman and Peter stay one step ahead.
episodes.title: In Poor Taste

episodes.synopsis: Shelley's connection to Dr. Pryce is further revealed, Destiny helps Peter understand the recent murder, and the gala at the Tower goes horribly awry.
episodes.title: Hello, Handsome

episodes.synopsis: Peter and Roman follow Lisa Willoughby's trail to the old steel mill, where they find a missing piece of the puzzle. Christina's date goes poorly.
episodes.title: The Crucible

episodes.synopsis: Shelley commits an act of independence, Chasseur questions Roman but crosses paths with Olivia, and Peter and Roman's friendship takes a turn.
episodes.title: Measure of Disorder

episodes.synopsis: After drunkenly attacking the Godfrey Institute, Roman falls into a coma and embarks on a subconscious journey of shocking truths and revelations.
episodes.title: Catabasis

episodes.synopsis: As a full moon approaches, Letha's parents discover her relationship with Peter. Despite a crisis of faith, Chasseur prepares to capture the killer.
episodes.title: What Peter Can Live Without

episodes.synopsis: A weakened Roman emerges from his coma and reunites with Peter to stop the killer. Hemlock Grove braces itself for another lethal full moon.
episodes.title: What God Wants

episodes.synopsis: Peter and his mother hide from vigilantes seeking the killer, while Christina disappears and Roman finally begins to face the truth about his nature.
episodes.title: The Price

episodes.synopsis: As Olivia and Chasseur face off at the Mill, Shelley learns the awful truth about her family, and Peter and Roman uncover the killer's identity.
episodes.title: Children of the Night

episodes.synopsis: The tragic conclusion to the Hemlock Grove killing spree leaves both the Godfrey and Rumancek families devastated, with the final horror yet to come.
episodes.title: Birth

episodes.synopsis: Peter returns to Hemlock Grove in search of money to afford a lawyer for Lynda while Roman tries to satiate his newly found appetite.
episodes.title: Blood Pressure

episodes.synopsis: Roman invites an outsider to be his guest. Destiny attempts to bring clarity to Peter’s dreams. Olivia grows frustrated adapting to her ailments.
episodes.title: Gone Sis

episodes.synopsis: Peter explores the scene of his haunted premonitions. Meanwhile, Olivia demands exclusivity from Norman at all costs.
episodes.title: Luna Rea

episodes.synopsis: Roman’s hunger tempts him beyond his self-control. New evidence arises in the search for Shelley. Peter comes to the aid of a child in need.
episodes.title: Bodily Fluids

episodes.synopsis: Miranda and Roman seek medical advice. Peter and Destiny must find a new way of helping Lynda when her attorney informs them the case is hopeless.
episodes.title: Hemlock Diego's Policy Player's Dream Book

episodes.synopsis: Roman undertakes his first treatment with Dr. Pryce; Norman sets up a rendezvous with a beloved relative he thought was lost forever.
episodes.title: Such Dire Stuff

episodes.synopsis: A family reunion unfolds with layers of typical Godfrey dysfunction. Peter and Roman’s quest to save lives forces them to reveal their true natures.
episodes.title: Lost Generation

episodes.synopsis: Roman tells Norman the truth about their family. Olivia’s rehabilitation takes an unexpected turn. Destiny discovers what the murderers are plotting.
episodes.title: Unicorn

episodes.synopsis: While Peter undergoes questioning, Roman proceeds with his final transfusion. An unexpected alliance forms when a threat to Olivia's life is revealed.
episodes.title: Tintypes

episodes.synopsis: Peter recuperates at home. At the White Tower, Roman takes care of unfinished business and Norman has a final confrontation with Olivia.
episodes.title: Demons and the Dogstar

episodes.synopsis: The search for Miranda and Nadia digs into Spivak's past. Roman has an encounter with a mysterious stranger. Andreas and Destiny plan their future.
episodes.title: A Place to Fall

episodes.synopsis: Annie reveals her secrets to Roman as they probe a connection between two attacks. Olivia is unable to feed and Miranda must fend for herself.
episodes.title: Souls on Ice

episodes.synopsis: Pryce deduces the nature of the creature and looks for links to the Spivak monster. Roman explores upir customs. Peter grills Andreas about the heist.
episodes.title: The House in the Woods

episodes.synopsis: Peter makes a bold move to head off a war between the Gypsies and the Croatian mob. After an agonizing detox, Pryce delivers disturbing news.
episodes.title: Every Beast

episodes.synopsis: Ochoa encourages Olivia to reach out to Annie. Destiny's sanity begins to crumble in Andreas's absence, and Pryce is besieged by childhood memories.
episodes.title: Boy in the Box

episodes.synopsis: As Olivia's condition worsens, she drops a bombshell on Roman. The wolf pack shuns Peter, who struggles to hide the truth about Andreas from Destiny.
episodes.title: Pendant

episodes.synopsis: A plan to save Olivia requires a search for the perfect mark at an upir conference. Destiny confronts Roman about Andreas.
episodes.title: Todos Santos

episodes.synopsis: Aitor ponders leaving Hemlock Grove and asks Shelley to join him. Roman manipulates Peter into turning on Milan.
episodes.title: Dire Night on the Worm Moon

episodes.synopsis: Gruesome discoveries await Roman and Peter at Spivak's cabin. As Olivia's time runs out, she targets her son. Pryce consoles a heartbroken Shelley.
episodes.title: Damascus

episodes.synopsis: Blinsky tends to Roman's wounds at the White Tower. After leaving Nadia with Shelley, Annie confronts Olivia about her father's death.
episodes.title: Brian's Song
